remarks: The successor of a decimal integer (with carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numsucc.1 $e |- Y e. NN0 $.
numsucc.2 $e |- T = ( Y + 1 ) $.
numsucc.3 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numsucc.4 $e |- ( A + 1 ) = B $.
numsucc.5 $e |- N = ( ( T x. A ) + Y ) $.
numsucc $p |- ( N + 1 ) = ( ( T x. B ) + 0 ) $.
